name: Determination (Rykuzu Studios)
description:
[Controls]

WASD Movement

Left click: mouse interaction/shoot

V: Pause game/Adjust volume

[Description]

It seems your slowly losing your confidence. You must not realize how important that is for you. Maybe you'll realize how important it is when you go through a series of challenges.

[More Info]

This game was made for the 2 week B&W Game jam with the theme: "You only realize the value of something when its gone."

This was a truly inspirational theme for me and i am glad I stuck through this project and completed it to its fullest. I learned a whole lot and enjoyed setting up the levels and progression for this game.
